title: Angelo Maurizi
text:
Angelo Maurizi (<a href="L%27Aquila">L'Aquila</a>, 19 December 2000) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
His usual position is as a <a href="Flanker%20%28rugby%20union%29">Flanker</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Rugby%20Calvisano">Calvisano</a> in <a href="Top12">Top12</a>.
He also represented <a href="Rugby%20Calvisano">Calvisano</a> in the <a href="2019%E2%80%9320%20European%20Rugby%20Challenge%20Cup">2019–20 European Rugby Challenge Cup</a> as "Additional Player".
In 2019 and 2020, Maurizi was named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 20</a> squad.
